snippet.title: LongStory 2015
snippet.description:
Introducing LongStory (http://longstorygame.com) the dating sim that helps players have happier, healthier relationships! LongStory is a unique empathic dating sim with consent curriculum built into the story. 

Players can choose their gender identity and their orientation. There are 5 dateable characters in LongStory: Two girls, two boys, and one… well, you’ll have to wait and see. Emotional learning has never been so fun for teens and tweens. 

LongStory episodes 1 - 3 are available for iOS and Android. Find out more at: http://longstorygame.com
